Support Vv Buttons respect their height. Buttons are able to wrap up to 2
lines of text before truncating their labels.
Really really really long (>)
Jumbo Button label trunc...
Jumbo Buttons are used to emphasise the final step of a
linear flow, typically at the end of a purchase journey
Its core objective is to emphasise a critical action that is to be taken next. Consider only
using the Jumbo Buttons in the final step of a flow, as its visual prominence will be
more useful to convey a critical decision, such as the confirmation of a payment in the
purchase flow.
Contact information Payment method >
Order summary
Being consistent across steps helps create a unified linear flow.
Do not pair Jumbo Buttons with any other secondary
actions
Give the user a clear suggestion on how to move forward by presenting only a single
primary action on each screen.
Delivery details > Delivery details >
Continue shopping
Complete purchase (> ] Complete purchase (> ]
L____________________________________________________________________________. _____________J
(] Present Jumbo Buttons as a stand-alone final action of the screen. (1) Don't pair Jumbo Buttons with secondary actions. Jumbo buttons are only used to
progress linear flows.
Regular Jumbo Button vs. Footer Jumbo Button
Regular variant is suitable for use on larger screens. They are inset and inline like a
typical button. The Footer variant can make the button label and arrow affordance feel
distant when stretched too wide. The Footer variant is better suited to small screens or
containers and usually bookends the screen by filling it from edge to edge.
Payment method >
Comfort configurator
.________________________________________________________________________________ _________________J
(] Use Regular Jumbo Button on larger screens. (] Use Footer Jumbo Button on mobile-only designs.
Use a verb in the label. Be concise.
Buttons perform actions. Use a verb to set the expectation of what action it performs.
Read more about writing for buttons.
Let's complete your purchase
Complete purchase >] i
P P of the planed kitchen
L________________________________________________________________________________ _______________J
(] “Complete purchase” provides clear expectation of this button's action. (1) Avoid use of long labels that read like a sentence. Provide context outside, around
the button instead of inside it.
